title: Advanced curriculum for ecosystem understanding and environmental problem-solving

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational biology and environmental science knowledge
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment, aiming to enhance environmental awareness through real-life connected cases. Learners are required to possess expertise to work as teachers or environmental education instructors.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze and explain ecosystem components and their interactions.
Learners can propose three or more lesson designs applying biodiversity conservation strategies to real educational settings.
Learners can measure educational effectiveness by utilizing scientific approaches to solving environmental problems as assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
